text: SMRT Corporation is a public transport operator in Singapore operating bus and rail services. SMRT is part of the Government of Singapore's Temasek Holdings. It was created on 6 August 1987 and was listed on the Singapore Exchange from 26 July 2000 until 31 October 2016. It is one of the two major companies of Singapore's rail services along with SBS Transit. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Singapore Category:Public transport
title: SMRT Corporation
